body: @zxc-kun: probably not. This is after chapter 5. He still thinks Iori is the only one he loves. Haruka’s case is him trying to keep her quiet to not ruin his “relationship”, and Karen’s like one night stand (but he probably see her more as a precious junior he gets along with rather than someone to date). He can’t mind control Ouka (Iori’s mother), thus he tried making this deal so Ouka pretend she doesn’t know Iori is dating someone. If she blurts it out, Iori might notice something is wrong with her memories and Ouka might realize about the mind control.
@minminazusa : Icic, no wonder she still able to act rationally in the middle of story. So... I guess next story is oyakodon huh?
Hoooh....The hypnosis app is failing huh... Should be interesting.

@zxc-kun : for some reason, only the function to make her horny works. The other such as giving command or erasing memory don't. He asks Iori's mother to keep it a secret. Probably runs in the family, her mom also gets really into sex when her switch is flipped. In the end, she promised she will pretend she didn't saw the protagonist and Iori having sex, but she wants to have another round. It's been 10 years since her husband passed away.

Ah, this is after chapter 5 (https://www.pixiv.net/artworks/91420188), which is not uploaded yet. Really curious about the development after that. Karen's story should be after chapter 4, and in chapter 4.5 he tried to put a distance, but Iori approached him instead, although still because her body wants the pleasure rather than saying anything about her feeling.
So, iori's mother isn't fully hypnotized? Or maybe she's already fallen? Cuz in the p44, the protag seems to be surprised by her whisper.

@minminazusa Nah. The hypnosis wore off in chapter 4 because he didn't charge his phone. Normal Iori came back and he got some weird urge to confess to her in the middle of raping her and she flat-out rejected him.
Missed the previous chapters, but he is in serious relationship with Iori, right?
Story seems ok ( not that I can read it) but I don't care for the artwork/ character design they both look like loli... On the daughter it's fine... but not on the mom/milf ....
Lmao now he goes for her mom too
Always in for a treat when you see Ichiyo Moka.
